text: Tnx <@UM840B04X>. Got it to work with this workaround. I still hope someone can tell me why I canâ€™t get the value directly from the object like I can width `{% set en_url = content.translated_content.en.absolute_url %}`

if you set the variable inside a loop, it will be accessible only there.  check this here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/for-loops#variables-within-loops>. the only way I know to have access to values inside the loop is the method I shown you.
